{Talos}
Maximal Exploritory Vessel, Aragorn: Bridge
Morning

The smoke filled his optics, blinding him, the sizzle and sparking panels
flashed as his vision cleared the sounds of smaller explosions within his
ship told him the crash had been a bad one. He looked around at the others
strewn about in the crash. Some he knew would never rise again, others had
already begun to move, to shake off the effects of the forced landing.
"Everyone who isn't deactivated sound off."

    His words while commanding were spoken lightly, no need to shoutat them
yet after the crash. Sitting up in his chair he reached out touching a comm
button, frowning at the crackle and hiss as he opened the line to the
thruster section of the frigate. Smacking the panel with his metallic fist
he was rewarded by the ping of connection, "Engineering report, how bad's
the damage...can we lift off again anytime soon?"

    Shaking the last few webs of energon from his memory circuits he got a
good look outside the ships main window, or at least the massive shattered
remains of the window. Outside the sky was clear and clouds covered the sky
in fluffy patches. At least they didn't land in the middle of a desert,
that's all they needed, sand in their joints, or worse, snow....he didn't
mind cold weather assignments so much it's just he disliked snow itself and
the cold that came with it....

    Shaking his head again he frowned, that window needed repairing if they
were gonna lift off again, the blast doors that sheilded them could still be
working but flying based on sensors alone was always risky. Touching the
communication button again, "Engineering, status on thrusters and general
ship systems."

(OOC)

    Just to beat rauq to the punch the first post for the new beast wars...
:)
